sections.heading: Civil jurisdiction; amount in controversy
sections.text:
Unless otherwise specified by law, the Justice of the Peace Court shall have civil jurisdiction over the following:(1) Common-law actions in contract, express or implied, and common-law actions in tort for damage, destruction or taking of personal property (
